name: Vejret Widget
author: vejret

sections.description:
The only Danish weather forecast widget plugin!

Vejreti.com offers an accurate weather forecast for all cities around the world.
Just set the city and country and embed the widget in your website/blog.

  • Widgets are free of charge
  • Widget style can be customized
  • Responsive weather widget
  • No development skills are needed
  • High performance and lightweight code
  • SEO friendly – no iframes

** For customization requests please contact this mail contact@vejreti.com
sections.installation:
1. Upload vejret.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add the vejret widget to your page from the widgets tab
sections.faq:
How much it cost?

The widget is free of charge, no small – NO small print.

Can I change the location?

Yes the location is being set dynamically when you add the widget

Can I change the background and font colors?

Yes you can

I need special customization, can I talk with someone?

Yes send a mail to contact@vejret.com, we are highly responsive.

short_description: This is a Danish weather forecast widget, Just select your location and you are good to go!
